channel.title: Testscape Help Needed!
channel.description: I need to be able ton configure the looks. But, when I type ::char it brings up the interface, I can choose stuff with arrows and all, but, see, when I hit accept, NOTHING happens, and, Im stuck on that screen till I log out and in. Anyone know how to get this working. I got about 100+ people waitin for this feature. Please help.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 06, 2006, 08:18:03 PM[/size][hr]Bump

item.title: Testscape Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

Why cant I use the char function? It works on most servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @PussyCrunch PussyCrunch
item.description:
@PussyCrunch wrote:

If you want to be able to change your characters looks, you would have to make it yourself. In client.java, search “male” and take the code from there, and change the numbers. For example, it would say something like this…

phead =# pbeard = # ptorso = #

Where it says #, change that number to how ever beard, torso, and hairstyle you want it.

Then change the command name from “male” to “person1” or something along those lines.

Read full topic
